protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the formation of the NeuAc-alpha-2,3-Gal-beta-1,4-GlcNAc-, NeuAc-alpha-2,3-Gal-beta-1,3-GlcNAc- or NeuAc-alpha-2,3-Gal-beta-1,3-GalNAc- sequences found in terminal carbohydrate groups of glycoproteins and glycolipids. The highest activity is toward Gal-beta-1,3-GlcNAc and the lowest toward Gal-beta-1,3-GalNAc (By similarity).

pathway.name: Glycosphingolipid biosynthesis - lacto and neolacto series

reference.reference_text: Kitagawa H, Paulson JC: Cloning and expression of human Gal beta 1,3(4)GlcNAc alpha 2,3-sialyltransferase. Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 1993 Jul 15;194(1):375-82.
